Title: I Kill Giants
Writer: Joe Kelly (screenplay by), Joe Kelly (based on the Man of Action graphic novel "I Kill Giants" created by), J.M. Ken Niimura (based on the Man of Action graphic novel "I Kill Giants" created by)
Actors: Madison Wolfe, Zoe Saldana, Imogen Poots, Sydney Wade
Plot: Barbara Thorson struggles through life by escaping into a fantasy life of magic and monsters.
Country: USA, Belgium, Denmark, UK, Sweden, China
Production: Treehouse Pictures, Umedia, XYZ Films, 1492 Pictures
